Name: WEJAM
About the game: Making music with WEJAM is for everybody regardless of age or musical knowledge. Anybody can easily create beautiful melodies and riffs within minutes. But what's unique about WEJAM and really makes it shine, is that it connects you with people around the globe for a real-time jam session. WEJAM is built with smart algorithms that will make your jam sessions always sound great and in tune. WEJAM includes many high quality beats and sounds for you to start jamming in various musical styles. If you're using WEJAM on a windows device with a touchscreen, you can take advantage of full multi-touch support.
